name: lotus-workbench
preflight_fast_command: npm run lint && npm run typecheck
preflight_full_command: npm run lint && npm run typecheck && npm run test

name: lotus-gateway
preflight_fast_command: python -m ruff check . && python -m ruff format --check . && python -m mypy src && python -m pytest tests/unit tests/contract
preflight_full_command: python -m ruff check . && python -m ruff format --check . && python -m mypy src && python -m pytest tests/unit tests/contract tests/integration

name: lotus-advise
preflight_fast_command: python -m ruff check . && python -m ruff format --check . && python -m mypy --config-file mypy.ini && python -m pytest tests/unit
preflight_full_command: python -m ruff check . && python -m ruff format --check . && python scripts/dependency_health_check.py --requirements requirements.txt && python -m pip check && COVERAGE_FILE=.coverage.unit python -m pytest tests/unit --cov=src --cov-report= && COVERAGE_FILE=.coverage.integration python -m pytest tests/integration --cov=src --cov-report= && COVERAGE_FILE=.coverage.e2e python -m pytest tests/e2e --cov=src --cov-report= && python -m coverage combine .coverage.unit .coverage.integration .coverage.e2e && python -m coverage report --fail-under=99 && python -m mypy --config-file mypy.ini

name: lotus-performance
preflight_fast_command: python -m ruff check . && python -m ruff format --check . && python -m mypy --config-file mypy.ini && python -m pytest tests/unit
preflight_full_command: python -m ruff check . && python -m ruff format --check . && python scripts/dependency_health_check.py --requirements requirements.txt && python -m pip check && COVERAGE_FILE=.coverage.unit python -m pytest tests/unit --cov=app --cov=engine --cov=core --cov=adapters --cov-report= && COVERAGE_FILE=.coverage.integration python -m pytest tests/integration --cov=app --cov=engine --cov=core --cov=adapters --cov-report= && COVERAGE_FILE=.coverage.e2e python -m pytest tests/e2e --cov=app --cov=engine --cov=core --cov=adapters --cov-report= && python -m coverage combine .coverage.unit .coverage.integration .coverage.e2e && python -m coverage report --fail-under=99 && python -m mypy --config-file mypy.ini

name: lotus-core
preflight_fast_command: python -m ruff check src/services/query_service/app tests/unit/services/query_service --ignore E501,E701,I001 && python -m ruff format --check src/services/query_service/app tests/unit/services/query_service && python -m mypy --config-file mypy.ini && python -m pytest tests/unit/services/query_service -q
preflight_full_command: python -m ruff check src/services/query_service/app tests/unit/services/query_service --ignore E501,E701,I001 && python -m ruff format --check src/services/query_service/app tests/unit/services/query_service && python -m mypy --config-file mypy.ini && python scripts/coverage_gate.py

name: lotus-report
preflight_fast_command: python -m ruff check src tests scripts && python -m ruff format --check src tests scripts && python -m mypy --config-file mypy.ini src && python -m pytest tests/unit
preflight_full_command: python -m ruff check src tests scripts && python -m ruff format --check src tests scripts && python -m mypy --config-file mypy.ini src && python -m pytest tests --cov=src/app --cov-report=term --cov-fail-under=99

name: lotus-risk
preflight_fast_command: make lint && make typecheck && make test

name: lotus-manage
preflight_fast_command: make lint && make typecheck && make test
